subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: The American soccer team plays a World Cup qualifying match Tuesday in Mexico City, even as Costa Rica appeals its loss to the United States in blizzard-like conditions Friday.
snippet: The American soccer team plays a World Cup qualifying match Tuesday in Mexico City, even as Costa Rica appeals its loss to the United States in blizzard-like conditions Friday.
